New Records: Neco Williams scored an unstoppable free-kick in the match
Daniel James scored on his 50th appearance for Wales
Ethan Ampadu won his 50th cap at the age of 23
Key Match Events: David Brooks opened the scoring for Wales early on
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland before the break
Brennan Johnson's strike took the heat out of the tie
Daniel James capped the scoring for Wales
Neco Williams scored a spectacular free-kick
Pre-Game Insights: Wales knew they needed fresh blood to fire and they delivered
The match was a changing of the guard for Wales with several new players featuring in the starting lineup
Post-Match Reflections: Wales manager Rob Page said the next few days are tantamount to the half-time interval before the final against Poland
Page emphasized the importance of going toe to toe with Poland to reach the Euros
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a bid for Wales to reach a third successive European Championship and a fourth major tournament in five
Wales have now won each of their last three playoffs in Cardiff
Robert Lewandowski was not on the scoresheet for Poland in their semi-final against Estonia
